tool.name: Add/Remove/Merge
tool.command: #if $method_choice.method == "remove" norm_data.R --input1=$input --output=$output --action=$method_choice.method --colName=$method_choice.param #else if $method_choice.method == "add" norm_data.R --input1=$input --input2=$input --output=$output --action=$method_choice.method --colName=$method_choice.param #else if $method_choice.method == "merge" norm_data.R --input1=$input --input2=$input --output=$output --action=$method_choice.method #end if
tool.help: This tool allows adding/removing spectra from data sets as well as merging datasets. Note that the spectra have to be imported the same way and contain the same number of raw points.
